div.p: View the file below or Download File Now

div.span: Andover USD 385 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its employment practices or in its programs and activities, and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. Persons having inquiries concerning USD 385’s non-discrimination policies and compliance therewith may contact the school district’s Compliance Coordinator at 1432 N. Andover Rd., Andover, KS, 67002, or call 316-218-4661.
